hadiths.text: It was narrated that Rabi’ah bin Ghaz asked ‘Aishah about the fasting of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ). She said:“He used to fast all of Sha’ban, until he joined it to Ramadan.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي وِصَالِ شَعْبَانَ بِرَمَضَانَ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning joining Sha`ban to Ramadan
